broomExtra 2.6.0
  • Reference

  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

broomExtra 2.6.0 Unreleased

  • Slight modification to easystats_to_tidy_names to cover naming patterns from a few more easystats packages.

broomExtra 2.5.0 2020-03-17

  • The glance_performance function now returns a combined summary dataframe from broom and performance packages, if both are available. This was done to include some unique performance measures that only the performance package contains (e.g., Nagelkerke’s R2, Tjur’s R2, etc.).

  • Thanks to Sarah, the package now has a hexsticker.

broomExtra 2.0.0 2020-02-22

  • New functions that make it easy to access tidy dataframes from both broom-family and easystats-family packages with the following functions: tidy_parameters and glance_performance.

  • tidy method no longer attempt to convert entered objects to a tibble as a last resort as this was converting model objects in case the tidiers failed for some reason.

broomExtra 1.0.1 2020-01-07

  • Minor internal refactoring of code.

broomExtra 1.0.0 2019-12-17

  • Deprecated boot_ functions as they added nothing over and above rsample.

broomExtra 0.0.6 2019-10-26

  • Maintenance release to make package compatible with dplyr 0.8.4.

broomExtra 0.0.5 2019-08-19

  • In addition to trying to extract results using tidiers from broom and broom.mixed, broomExtra::tidy now also attempts to convert the entered object into a tibble dataframe. This is solely to deal with dataframes which are often encountered while writing wrapper functions around tidy.

  • Minor refactoring of boot_ generic functions to make them compatible with upcoming release of tidyr.

  • More operators from tidyverse added to reexports.

broomExtra 0.0.4 2019-06-25

  • Adds new functions for bootstrapping: boot_tidy, boot_glance, boot_augment.

broomExtra 0.0.3 2019-05-20

  • This is maintenance release to make the package compatible with R 3.6.0.

broomExtra 0.0.2 2019-04-03

  • This is maintenance release to make the package compatible with dplyr 0.8.1.

broomExtra 0.0.1 2019-03-13

  • Initial release.

Contents
